app_detail:
Play in all format video, including MKV, MP4, M4V, AVI, MOV, 3GP, FLV, WMV, RMVB, TS etc.

App Features:
ğŸ˜ Support subtitle downloader.
ğŸ˜ Plays HD videos.
ğŸ˜ play avi vedio with avi player.
ğŸ˜ video speed controller.
ğŸ˜ Night Mode, Quick Mute & Playback Speed.
ğŸ˜ awesome video player
ğŸ˜ share or manage videos.
ğŸ˜ Hardware acceleration.
ğŸ˜ playbackr videoplayer.
ğŸ˜ share video files with friends.
ğŸ˜ fast video forward and backword.
ğŸ˜ Adjust video equalizer.
ğŸ˜ Adjust subtitle and audio.
ğŸ˜ video player hd support.
ğŸ˜ Easy to manage volume, brightness and playing progress.
ğŸ˜ Support video player all format, including MP4, 3GP, AVI, FLV, M4V, MOV, WMV, RMVB, MKV TS etc.
ğŸ˜ Powerful equalizer.
ğŸ˜ Multi playback option: auto-rotation, aspect-ratio, screen-lock etc.
ğŸ˜ Ultra HD video player, support 4K.
ğŸ˜ Identify ALL video files on your device and SD Card automatically.

Outstanding sound effects 
HD Video Player with the equalizer, bass booster, and stereo surround sound effect, Make you feel like being in the cinema.

Enjoy high quality videos plays smoothly 
HD Video Player with the device default decoder for decoding, thus ensuring the speed and effectiveness of the video for you to enjoy smoother better quality videos.

Easy and convenient control 
Sliding the video screen to control the volume, screen brightness and the progress.

support Formats 
Video player supports almost all video formats including AVI , MP4 , WMV , RMVB , MKV , 3GP , M4V , MOV , TS , MPG , FLV etc, just depends on your device decoder.

High Quality Video Player 
We ensure that your file is played in the original resolution, through the optimization of the encoding format file playback speed and effectiveness to achieve the best results.
